  Load packages and import data
```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, data.table, coloc,TwoSampleMR, ggpubr, 
               ieugwasr, rio, here)

source("code/Functions.R")

here::i_am("analyses/JAK3.Rmd")

```

# eQTL

Import data 
```{r}
JAK3_eqtl <- import_data("data/export/JAK3_eqtl_TwoSampleMR.csv", 
                         "data/export/JAK3_T1D_TwoSampleMR.csv", has_beta = FALSE)
```



## Manhattan plots

```{r}
#create Manhattan plots with vertical lines indicating the selected area (see below 2.4)
manhattan_plots(JAK3_eqtl, gene_start = 17935589, 
                gene_end=17958880, 
                title = "JAK3")
ggsave("figures/JAK3-eqtl-manhattan-fig.png",
       height = 6, width = 6, units = "in")
```

## Coloc assuming 1 causal variant
```{r}
analyze_coloc_eqtl(JAK3_eqtl)

```
